Comment: Eh, this isn't something the administration can ignore the courts on, as they need the courts for enforcement. If a studio or streaming service refuses to pay the duty and they have the court rulings on their side, the admin is pretty much shit out of luck. Going heavy handed against rich corporations, when those corps have the courts in their side, is beyond what Trump can get away with.
